parameters.name: Bandwidth
parameters.description: The peak bandwidth of the EIP. Default value: 5. Valid values: 5 to 10000. Unit: Mbit/s.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of elastic IP address (EIP).

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Node Service (ENS) node.

parameters.name: InstanceChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the EIP. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription
*   **PostPaid** (default): pay-as-you-go on a monthly basis

>  If you set **InstanceChargeType** to **PostPaid**, you cannot set **InternetChargeType** to **PayByBandwidth**.

parameters.name: InternetChargeType
parameters.description:
The metering method of the EIP. Valid values:

*   **PayByBandwidth** (default): pay-by-bandwidth
*   **95BandwidthByMonth**: pay-by-monthly-95th-percentile-bandwidth

parameters.name: Isp
parameters.description:
The Internet service provider. Valid values:

*   **cmcc**: China Mobile
*   **unicom**: China Unicom
*   **telecom**: China Telecom
